name: Abyss Seeker
description:
This RPG is set in the expansive dungeon known as the 'Grand Labyrinth,' where you explore dungeons while leveling up your character. Centered around the story of the adventurer Barbara and a young man suffering from amnesia, the encounters and farewells with the diverse companions you meet in the labyrinth add a dramatic and exciting dimension to your adventure. What awaits you in the deepest recesses of the labyrinth? Tough bosses, hidden elements, and completion of coveted treasures also contribute to the rich gameplay experience.

The gameplay time is approximately 8 hours.

This work is a remake of the game 'Abyss Seeker,' which won the grand prize at the official RPG Maker Fes event, now adapted to RPG Maker MZ.

Control Instructions
Z Button: Confirm, Fast Forward
X Button: Open Menu Screen, Cancel
Arrow Keys: Move Character
Shift Key: Dash

Japanese language only.
